comments:
Eclipse 3.1.0, JDK 1.5.0_3, XP Pro, Pentium Mobile.

I downloaded and installed Eclipse 3.1.0 .
I followed instructions to import org.eclipse.swt.examples.
I found the document org.eclipse.swt.examples.launcher\
doc-html\swt_launcher_ex.html and followed instructions found in the link "SWT 
standalone examples setup".

A. Incorrect instructions.
swt_manual_setup.html is obsolete. It intructs to use 
org.eclipse.swt.win32_3.0.0\ws\win32\swt.jar and
org.eclipse.swt.win32_3.0.0\os\win32\x86
when it should be win32_3.1.0!

B. When I press run as instructed:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: no swt-win32-3101 
in java.library.path
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadLibrary(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.Runtime.loadLibrary0(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.System.loadLibrary(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.swt.internal.Library.loadLibrary(Library.java:100)
	at org.eclipse.swt.internal.win32.OS.<clinit>(OS.java:18)
	at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Device.init(Device.java:564)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.init(Display.java:1780)
	at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Device.<init>(Device.java:100)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.<init>(Display.java:355)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.<init>(Display.java:351)
	at org.eclipse.swt.examples.addressbook.AddressBook.main
(AddressBook.java:54)

C. I followed instructions to use Running the Example Launcher.
But Show View > Other does not have the item "SWT Example Launcher".

D. Okay. I'm quite Eclipsed already for the day.
I going back to my NetBeans session.
E. Veronika, is it a bug in the documentation?

The documentation is out of date and I have released new doc into HEAD.  Also,
the example src download does not contain any resources, just Java classes.  I
have fixed the build script to include resources but I have to wait for nightly
build to confirm 100% that all is fixed.
CAR, please verify that the doc is right (ie no java.library.path needed anymore) and close this bug.
